#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cassert>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long ULL;
#define x getchar()
#define y putchar
//Fast input
inline void read(ULL & num){
	num=0;
	char ch=x;int sign=1;
	while(ch<'0' || ch>'9'){if(ch=='-') sign=-1; ch=x;}
	while(ch>='0' && ch<='9'){
		num = num*10 + ch-'0';
		ch =x;
	}
	num*=sign;
}

//Fast output
inline void out(ULL k) {
	ULL n=k,i=0;
	char ch[19];
	if(n<=0) {
		if(n==0) y('0');		
		else 	y('-');
		n=n*-1;
		}
	while(n>0) {
		ch[i]=(n%10)+'0';
		n=n/10;
		i++;
		}
	while(i>0) {
		y(ch[i-1]);
		i--;
		}
	y('\n');
	}

ULL abS(ULL a)
{
	if(a < 0)a *= -1;
	return a;
}

int main(){
	
		ULL t, N, x1, y1, x2, y2, A, B,diff,steps;
		cin>>t;
		
		while(t--)
		{
			cin>>N;
			cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
			

			// Check if they are on the same point
			if(x1 > x2)	
			{
				A = x1-x2;
			}
			else
			{
				A = x2-x1;
			}
			if(y1 > y2)
			{
				B = y1-y2;
			}
			else 
			{
				B = y2-y1;
			}
			if(x1 == x2 && y1 == y2)
			{
				printf("0\n");
			}
			else if(A == B && A != 0)
			{
				printf("1\n");
			}
			else if(A % 2 == 0 && B % 2 == 1)
			{
				printf("-1\n");
			}
			else if(A % 2 == 1 && B % 2 == 0)
			{
				printf("-1\n");
			}
			else
			{
				printf("2\n");
			}
		}
		
		return 0;
}
